ai_briefing.events: User had a stressful Monday with lots of manuscripts and OT. Dealt with a chatty boss and a difficult colleague (Denise). Spent 2 hours fixing project errors in the evening. Mom caught a cold and blamed User's 'breath' (ä»™æ°£) when opening the door.
ai_briefing.atmosphere_or_emotion: Stressed and tired (headache from OT), feeling responsible/in-control at work, amused by mom's logic, too exhausted for hobbies.
ai_briefing.unfinished_topics: Silly Tavern 'Ghost School' scenario (playing as a Brat ghost staff).

ai_briefing.events: User dreamt of an IT colleague confessing to her. At work, she dealt with petty office politics where colleagues were blaming each other for minor mistakes. She forgot her yoga clothes again and went home to play Silly Tavern.
ai_briefing.atmosphere_or_emotion: Amused by the dream but highly frustrated/annoyed with work politics. Eager to escape into AI roleplay.
ai_briefing.unfinished_topics: Setting up the 'User' profile for the AI roleplay scenario.
